message: “Posing as 14-year-old girls, we also discovered just how quickly predators were on the prowl and how third-party apps for sharing profiles appeared to be facilitating access to minors. And we found that Kik hasn't even been deleting the profiles of individuals charged and convicted of child abuse offences,” said Forbes.

attachments.media_description: Predators using Kik Messenger app to groom kids says investigation
